 2007-01262007-02-01,  ,  ,  ,  IA&ND
ActIndian Act
PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA of its lawful power to acquire an interest in land situated within Sahhacum Indian Reserve No. 1, for the purposes of a provincial highway, and (b) transferring the land in question (Highway 11 at Bateman Road) to the Province, in lieu thereof.
